content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a radio telescope. Moving in a clockwise direction from the radio telescope, the elements on the path are a hartebeest, a pole, a pot, an oil filter, a vulture, an umbrella, a lampshade, a black-footed ferret, an infant bed, a horizontal bar, a cheetah, a sidewinder, a lorikeet, a corkscrew, an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, a kimono, a home theater, a trilobite, and a water snake. Starting from the home theater, you move around the ring by 18 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 10 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 6 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 19 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?
